security_audit.summary: Prompt-based skill using Claude vision for OCR. Uses Task agent for context isolation. File I/O is essential to purpose and uses only system Read/Write tools. No network calls, external commands, or code execution.

content.user_title: Convert PDF and Images to Markdown
content.value_statement: Extracting text from PDF documents and images requires multiple steps and tools. This skill uses Claude vision to accurately convert scanned documents and images into clean markdown format with proper structure preserved.
actual_capabilities: Convert PDF documents to markdown format
Process image files to editable text
Batch process multiple PDF and image files in parallel
Preserve document structure including tables and headings
Save as unified file or page-by-page
limitations: Does not handle password-protected or encrypted PDF files
Cannot process files exceeding Claude vision size limits
Complex layouts may require manual verification
Does not support audio or video file OCR

use_cases.title: Convert Research Papers
use_cases.description: Extract text from academic papers and scholarly articles for citation and analysis.

use_cases.title: Digitize Documents
use_cases.description: Convert scanned contracts, invoices, and forms into searchable text files.

use_cases.title: Extract Image Text
use_cases.description: Pull text from screenshots and images for blog posts and documentation.

prompt_templates.title: Extract Specific Content
prompt_templates.prompt: /ocr /path/to/report.pdf "Extract only the tables and their data"

output_examples.input: Extract text from this scanned report
output: Content types found: Tables, headings, bullet lists

best_practices: Use clear custom instructions to focus extraction on specific content types
For large documents, verify that complex tables are rendered correctly
Keep original files as reference when extracting from complex layouts
anti_patterns: Do not assume OCR will perfectly preserve complex formatting
Do not process sensitive documents without verifying output accuracy
Do not use for password-protected or encrypted PDF files

faq.question: What file sizes are supported?
faq.answer: Files must be under Claude vision size limits. Large PDFs may trigger 413 errors.

faq.question: Does this skill work with scanned PDFs?
faq.answer: Yes, scanned PDFs with images are processed using Claude vision capabilities.

faq.question: Can I extract text from handwritten notes?
faq.answer: Handwriting recognition accuracy varies. Simple, clear handwriting works best.

faq.question: How are complex tables preserved?
faq.answer: Tables are converted to markdown table format. Very complex layouts may need manual review.

faq.question: Is my data sent to external servers?
faq.answer: All processing uses Claude vision. No data is sent to third-party services.

faq.question: What is the difference between unified and page-by-page output?
faq.answer: Unified combines all pages into one file. Page-by-page creates separate files for each page.
